com.android.internal.view
Interface IInputMethodManager

All Superinterfaces:
IInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
IInputMethodManager.Stub
public interface IInputMethodManager
extends IInterface

Public interface to the global input method manager, used by all client applications.

Nested Class Summary
static class IInputMethodManager.Stub
          Local-side IPC implementation stub class.
